location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 12 to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter states that annual financial books are enclosed (but they are not contained in the file). The accounts - that report a loss - are discussed in detail in the letter.The letter also reports that there has been no change in the situation in Persia and confirms reports that two Dutch ships landed at Muscat. An additional note reports the arrival of Captain Charles Virtue from Bengal.
